message.content:
Sure, I can help you with that! Here's a sample healthy meal plan for today:

Breakfast:
- 2 scrambled eggs with vegetables (such as bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes)
- 1 slice of whole grain toast
- 1 cup of fruit salad (a mix of berries, melons, and citrus fruits)

Snack:
- 1 apple with a tablespoon of almond butter

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast or salmon fillet with steamed vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, and zucchini)
- 1 cup of brown rice or quinoa
- 1 side salad with a vinaigrette dressing

Snack:
- Greek yogurt with berries and chopped nuts

Dinner:
- Baked sweet potato with black beans and salsa
- Grilled vegetable stir-fry (such as bell peppers, zucchini, and mushrooms)
- 1 serving of steamed brown rice or quinoa

This meal plan provides a balance of protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats, and includes plenty of vegetables and whole grains. You can adjust the portions and ingredients to suit your taste preferences and dietary needs. Enjoy your healthy meals!
